alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Jackson; Mason; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gallia, southeastern Lawrence, Mason, northeastern Cabell, northwestern Putnam and west central Jackson Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Ona, or 9 miles northeast of Proctorville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Ripley, Barboursville, Buffalo, Crown City, Athalia, Henderson, Leon, Cheshire, Mount Alto, Southside, Scottown, Ashton, Grimms Landing, Gallopolis Ferry, Evans, Green Bottom and Pea Ridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 136 and 138. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 17 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio...and central, western and northwestern West Virginia.
